import React from 'react'; import aboutImg from '../assets/aboutImg.jpg'; const AboutMe = () => { return (

About Me

Hello! I'm Hemant, a passionate developer with a love for creating innovative solutions. With a background in Full Stack Developer, I have honed my skills in ReactJS, Tailwind CSS and MongoDB.

I enjoy working on projects that challenge me and allow me to learn new technologies.

In my free time, I love [Your Hobbies or Interests]. I believe that a good balance between work and personal life is essential for creativity and productivity.

Thank you for taking the time to learn more about me. I look forward to connecting with you!

); }; export default AboutMe;
